context_bundle.summary: Vulnerable and Outdated Components (OWASP A06:2021): Using libraries with known CVEs. Fix: maintain component inventory, monitor CVE databases continuously, use Software Composition Analysis (SCA) tools (Snyk, Dependabot, npm audit, pip-audit), only use official sources, monitor for unmaintained libraries.

onboarding.quick_start: Dependency security: 1) Run npm audit / pip-audit / dependency-check in CI/CD, 2) Enable Dependabot or Snyk for automated PRs, 3) Maintain SBOM (Software Bill of Materials), 4) Subscribe to security advisories for critical deps, 5) Remove unused dependencies.
common_patterns: GitHub Actions: dependabot auto-merge for patch updates

known_errors.cause: No automated dependency scanning, outdated lockfile
known_errors.solution: Run npm audit fix --force or manually update, test thoroughly
known_errors.prevention: Add dependency scan to CI/CD pipeline, block deploys with high/critical CVEs

known_errors.error: Using unmaintained library with known vulnerabilities
known_errors.cause: Library abandoned, no security patches available
known_errors.prevention: Check last commit date, issue activity before adopting dependencies
